column5: Aww they sound like a great therapist! Now Iâ€™m curious what the article was. Would you mind sharing it?

â€œTransferred from the IRSâ€ is a response that the federal processors put into place after the data breach. It is there to protect student and parent tax information. Ask them if attaching a copy of tax returns will suffice :)

What usually helps is having the actual tax papers on you and typing the name/address, etc the way it is written on the tax form.
The one you live with most. Resource: https://studentaid.ed.gov/sa/sites/default/files/who-is-my-parent.png
